question.title: Frequently Asked Questions
question.accordion1: Why are your prices so low?
question.accordion1_: Our prices are indeed lower than others, but this does not affect the quality. We have no extra staff, which reduces our expenses and allows us to offer affordable prices.
question.accordion2: Can I edit my website in the future?
question.accordion2_: Yes, absolutely! You will get access to the content management system (admin panel) along with instructions. The admin panel is user-friendly and does not require special skills.
question.accordion3: Do you provide support after website development?
question.accordion3_: After completing your website, we do not leave you alone! We offer free 24/7 maintenance and security for one year. After that, this service costs $10 per month.

team.titel: Why Us? Why do many people choose us?
team.desc1: Our websites are responsive, meaning they are optimized for tablets and mobile devices. No extra fees apply.
team.desc2: Your website will have a convenient and simple admin panel that will allow you to manage the site from within.
team.desc3: Our websites are protected by modern antivirus software and firewalls, making them resistant to spambots and attacks.
team.desc4: Your website's operation is monitored automatically 24/7 to ensure uninterrupted service.
team.desc5: Forget the hassle of domain and hosting. We provide a free UZ domain and hosting for 6 months (then $10/month).
team.desc6: Each website we create has a unique design that stands out. One design — one website!

price.title: Our Latest Projects
price.desc1: A one-page website is also called a landing page. It is simple and introduces customers to the necessary information.
price.desc2: This is the company's 'business card' on the internet. The purpose of the website is to present the company's services or products to visitors.
price.desc3: This website is created based on your order. You can request any website according to your preference.
